properties.displayName: MDR-CC-SNC-004-[WOS] Possible Malicious Download via Powershell
properties.description: Detección de descarga de herramientas/payloads potencialmente maliciosos desde internet a través de powershell.
properties.query:
//[TH][TA0011][T1105] Ingress Tool Transfer with Powershell 
DeviceProcessEvents
| where Timestamp >= ago(1h)
| where FileName in~ ("powershell.exe", "powershell_ise.exe")
| where ProcessCommandLine has "Net.WebClient"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "DownloadFile"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "Invoke-WebRequest"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "Invoke-Shellcode"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "http"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "IEX"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "Start-BitsTransfer"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "mpcmdrun.exe"
   or ProcessCommandLine has "-ep bypass"
| where InitiatingProcessCommandLine !contains "C:\\Windows\\system32\\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs"
| where InitiatingProcessCommandLine <> "CcmExec.exe"
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath <> "c:\\program files\\windows defender advanced threat protection\\senseir.exe"
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath !contains "\\opendns\\umbrella roaming client\\umbrelladiagnostic.exe"
| where ProcessCommandLine !contains "microsoft.com"
| where ProcessCommandLine !contains "slackb.com"
| where ProcessCommandLine !contains "api.github.com/repos/chrisant996/clink/releases" and AccountName has "bosipele"
| project Timestamp, AccountName, DeviceName, InitiatingProcessCommandLine, FileName, ProcessCommandLine
| top 100 by Timestamp
